title: Disappointment

en: Hey. I just wanted to say, I know you've got your own things going on, but I really appreciate that you made time for me.
I was concerned that when you went all self-employed, you'd disappear from the people you know because you work too much or whatever. Not you!
In my opinion, you got your priorities straight!

no_caption: Work is still gonna be a priority for a while, but thanks.
